entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
